entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wetaskiwin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
